mutants.code:
import base64

def reverse_encode_decode(sen):
    reversed_sen = ''.join(sen.split()[::-1])
    encoded_sen = base64.b64encode(reversed_sen.encode())
    decoded_sen = base64.b64decode(encoded_sen).decode()
    return decoded_sen

import base64

def reverse_encode_decode(sen):
    reversed_sen = ' '.join(sen.split()[::+1])
    encoded_sen = base64.b64encode(reversed_sen.encode())
    decoded_sen = base64.b64decode(encoded_sen).decode()
    return decoded_sen

import base64

def reverse_encode_decode(sen):
    reversed_sen = ' '.join(sen.split()[::--1])
    encoded_sen = base64.b64encode(reversed_sen.encode())
    decoded_sen = base64.b64decode(encoded_sen).decode()
    return decoded_sen
